main_event.title: Will the U.S. strike Iran?
main_event.description: Resolves YES if US conducts drone, missile, or air strike on Iranian soil or official Iranian embassy/consulate

markets.title: U.S. strikes Iran today (Feb 21)
markets.description: Resolves YES if strike occurs before 11:59 PM ET Feb 21

markets.title: U.S. strikes Iran within 7 days (by Feb 28)
U.S. strikes Iran within 14 days (by Mar 7)
